about_the_game:
Your wife has been kidnapped. The broken system is out to get you. Corrupt cops and goons swarm your once peaceful home, now thoroughly defiled.

Play as an ' aam aadmi ' - a common man living a peaceful life with his beautiful wife in a modern-day India. Fight against hordes of enemies and save what you love. Kick down doors, kick down enemies - anything that stands in your path. Take time off and drink your wife's special tea, then continue your carnage. 

Shoot and kick your way through destructible environments as you mow down hordes of scared enemies. Pick from an assortment of modern Indian weapons and a generous cache of ammunition for enacting your revenge. Use empty magazines as lethal weapons if guns and annihilating doors feels not enough. Hunt down the last vestiges of the system out to get you in style and speed, and end it all with a long, long night with your eccentric wife in the bed.

Key Features:

  • Simple, straight-forward combat: shoot and kick your way through rooms and hallways teeming with enemies

  • Semi-destructible environments: blast or bulldoze your way through partially-destructible environments just like in Bollywood movies

  • Gripping storyline with a dark and esoteric plot

Warning: this game contains use of explicit language and suggestive and potentially mature content.

The base game is only available in the English language as of now.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains suggestive content and contains depictions that hint at characters having participated in acts of BDSM
